participant_1.background:
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
I enjoy the creative process of designing and sewing my own clothes.
My parents are proud of my photography.
I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing.

participant_2.background:
I am a coffee lover who cares for my pets and family.
my parents were scientists.
i live by myself.
I love the rain because it gives me an excuse to stay indoors and read my romance novels.
i love chickens.

content.text: Hi! What is your favorite way to spend a rainy day?
Hello! I love to read romance novels on rainy days.
Oh, I love romance novels too! What are your favorite authors?
I love Julia Quinn, Jennifer Probst, and Lisa Kleypas.
Those are all great authors! I love Julia Quinn's Bridgerton series.
Me too! I am so excited for the new season of the TV show!
Me too! I have been reading the books again in preparation.
Oh, I haven't read the books yet. I'm going to have to check them out.
You definitely should! They are so good.
No problem! What do you like to do when you're not reading?
I love to spend time with my pets, they are my best friends.
I love my pets too! I have a dog and a cat.
I have a dog and a cat too! They are the best.
I agree! I love taking them for walks and playing with them.
Me too! They make me so happy.
